meanings.definition: A group of heme-containing proteins involved in electron transport in cells.
meanings.sent1: The cytochromes play a crucial role in moving electrons within cells.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study cytochromes to understand how cells generate energy.
meanings.sent3: The cytochromes in the cell were having a race to see who could transport electrons the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny power stations, cytochromes keep the cell running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the cytochromes shimmered like tiny jewels in the cell.
